name: Unfold Genesis
description:
Fish Hoe, 2021

‘Unfold’ highlights the virtuality of our thoughts versus the simplicity of actual reality and matter. Overthinking makes us suffer more than reality makes us. The more we over-idealize or intellectualize the outcome the more complicated it becomes for us. Whether we spin our minds all over the matter or skip worrying altogether. Naturally, it will unfold the way it’s supposed to be, and the best way is to take the flow of life itself as the way it is and accept the nature of the unknown future.

Please visit www.pinktank.art for more information.
